attributes.title: Very bad app
attributes.review: I would not recommend this stupid app nor this evil “politician” to anyone. I would actually give it 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: Terrible app - it’s a scam
attributes.review: This app is a scam to steal your information, absolutely terrible, delete immediately, this app must be taken off the store

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my phone started to glitch and this app is VERY slow. Don’t  waste your time on this app

this app is terrible. 😤when i open it all i see is the word trump and donald trumps face.👹🤡 this is a terrible thing to first see when i open the app. no one wants to see that. i felt disgusted🤢 and had to delete the app immediately. this is not suitable for the app store.🤬 the images displayed are very unprofessional, bad, and evil 🙀🙀

attributes.title: Don’t use this app
attributes.review: This app made my phone start dancing and falling if the bed by itself and cracking thanks a lot for this app my phone is💀

attributes.title: STOLE MY MONEY
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded, it asked me for donations ALL THE TIME. I ended up donating $100 but it took $500 !! Haven’t gotten it back and nobody will answer my emails on how to get it back!!

attributes.title: Don’t download
attributes.review: The app won’t even load! And when I try to click on the app my phone restarts! Don’t download this app.

attributes.title: Worst app ever made 😡
attributes.review: Not only did it take years to download but it cause my entire phone glitch.

attributes.title: App is doodrooook
attributes.review: The application I just downloaded named trump 2020 has brought my views on him drastically. Go Kanye, I’m proud to say that this app shouldn’t be on the market. This is a stinky bad bad app and hurts my children.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app took five hours to download and was glitching out when I tried to get out off the app.
